items.title: The Primary Network
items.description: Lux features 3 built-in blockchains which includes Exchange Chain (X-Chain), Platform Chain (P-Chain), and Contract Chain (C-Chain). More info here.

items.title: X-Chain API
items.description: This page is an overview of the Exchange Chain (X-Chain) API associated with Luxd.

items.title: X-Chain Transaction Format
items.description: This page is an overview of the AVM transaction format associated with Luxd X-Chain API.
